course_name: Theory and Research in Strategic Management
description: This course is about strategic management as an area of theory building and empirical inquiry. It is an advanced-level course that overviews strategic management theory and research through reading and critiquing the scholarly literature. The format is a seminar that emphasises guided student discussion of articles.
restricted:
BAdvBus(Hons), BBusMan(Hons), GCBusRMeth, GDipBRM, PhD, MPhil.
Quota: Minimum of 10 enrolments
